Certifications & Accreditations

Our certifications reflect Green Orbit Digital’s commitment to professional excellence, ethical standards, and sustainable business practices across the digital and space sectors.

Green Orbit Digital’s team holds a wealth of professional certifications in digital marketing, analytics, sustainability, and space sector expertise. This includes advanced marketing qualifications from the Digital Marketing Institute, Google, and HubSpot, as well as Green Digital Skills from INCO Academy.

Our leadership also brings specialised knowledge in space studies from the International Space University, along with advanced degrees in Physics, Astrophysics, and Science Communication. These certifications underpin our commitment to delivering high-quality, sustainable digital marketing solutions.

Each certification demonstrates our dedication to professional excellence, innovation, and embedding sustainability into our work across the digital and space industries.

Our Credentials

Professional Certifications

We value continuous learning and credible recognition. Our team’s certifications from globally respected institutions ensure expertise in marketing, sustainability, and digital strategy.

Chartered Marketer (CMktr)

Issuer: Chartered Institute of Marketing (CIM)

Awarded: 2021

Recipient: Ryan Laird

The Chartered Marketer designation recognises a high level of expertise, experience and commitment to continued professional development in marketing.

Learn More

Google Analytics Certification

Issuer: Google

Awarded: 2024

Validated proficiency in Google Analytics for data-driven marketing insights and performance analysis.

Learn More

B Corp Impact Assessment (Completed)

Issuer: B Lab

Awarded: 2025

Completed the B Impact Assessment as part of ongoing commitment to social and environmental performance standards.

Learn More

SBA Accreditation (in progress)

Issuer: Sustainable Business Alliance

Working toward official accreditation aligned with SBA sustainability reporting standards.

Learn More

HubSpot Solutions Partner

Issuer: HubSpot

Awarded: 2023

Recognised partner with certified expertise in CRM, inbound marketing, automation and reporting using the HubSpot platform.

Learn More

UKspace Membership

Issuer: UKspace

Awarded: 2022

Active member and Chair of the Startup Working Group, promoting sustainable growth and innovation in the UK space sector.

Learn More

Carbon Literacy Certification (anticipated)

Issuer: The Carbon Literacy Project

Working towards carbon literacy accreditation to support climate-aware decision making in digital delivery.

Learn More

Sustainable Digital Design (Training Completed)

Issuer: Sustainable Web Design

Awarded: 2024

Completed training on designing low-emission, energy-efficient websites based on W3C and GHG Protocol aligned principles.

Learn More

Cyber Essentials (In progress)

Issuer: IASME Consortium

Aiming for baseline certification to demonstrate commitment to secure digital practices.

Learn More
Sustainability

Aligned With UN SDGs

Our certifications demonstrate not just professional expertise but also our commitment to guiding the marketing and space industries toward ethical and environmentally conscious practices. All campaigns are designed to align with the UN Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs), ensuring innovation with responsibility.

Verification & Credibility

Credentials can be independently verified via their issuing bodies or professional registers. For confirmation or partnership documentation, please contact hello@greenorbit.space.

Contact Us
Impact Orbit Creative Group

Impact Orbit Creative Group is a multi-disciplinary consultancy and innovation hub focused on driving sustainable growth, digital transformation, and impact-led strategies in the space and technology sectors. We partner with organisations and startups worldwide to deliver strategic guidance, communications expertise, and frameworks for responsible innovation.
